RODIMUS had been smiling broadly as ELITA=
 and NIGHTLIGHT were being
reunited. He had even leaned back a little to al=
low the two to hug and
show affection. That is until ELITA=92s last stateme=
nt and he could see
the look on NIGHTLIGHT=92s face.

Smiling warmly and no=
dding RODIMUS took NIGHTLIGHT=92s hand. =93Yes,
Perceptor has been instrume=
ntal in your recovery.=94 Leaning back in he
continued to smile at her, hop=
ing to wipe away her fears if he could.

=93From what we can tell, Percepto=
r has joined the Maximals.=94 RODIMUS
rubbed ELITA=92s head giving her reas=
surance and affection as well.
=93Just like our daughter here has said.=94

LDER looked away from the door, his optics reddening slightly. If he

int.=94

why don=92t you show Perceptor around the base and help him get settl=

For a=
 moment LEGACY looked confused, his single crimson optic boring
into STRAIG=
HT SHOT as his mind ran over what she said.

=93I do not understand all of =
the colloquialisms than you have
utilized.=94 He said at last, =93But I asc=
ertain that you are attempting
to explain your sibling=92s actions to me an=
d inquiring as to why I will
not allow Tuscon to disturb Optimus Prime=92s =
chassis.=94

LEGACY=92s optic flickered for a moment. =93I appreciate your =
intent.=94 He
said his words clear and well articulated. =93But I do not re=
quire an
explanation, since I have taken no offense to his actions; to do s=
o
would be an inefficient use of my time.=94

=93However to answer your que=
stion I will replay something for you.=94

Turning to the screen that was s=
tanding behind LEGACY he fired a beam
of energy at it. But instead of it ex=
ploding into shards of glass and
debris it simply changed to show a mountai=
nous scene, a volcano, and
then the volcano exploding to reveal the Ark. It=
 was obvious from the
motion that the events were being speeded up for ease=
 of viewing.

Soon after it happened a small satellite like device rose up =
from the
Ark and began to travel away from it and after a while return. Aft=
er
another short moment, short because of the speeded up play back,
MEGATRO=
N flew out along with STARSCREAM, SOUNDWAVE and a few other
Decepticon seek=
ers, obviously having been repaired by the device. They
all land on a cliff=

Inside the Ark, because of the blast from STARSCREAM, OPTIMU=
S PRIME is
also is knocked into the beam and his repair process begins.
